payment.arkanText: The installment plan offered by Arkan Company allows you to pay 40%, 50%, or 60% of the total amount upfront, with the remaining balance being paid in installments.This installment system is quite flexible and customer-friendly, making it easier to manage payments according to your financial situation.
payment.naturalText: This installment plan is the well-known system where you pay 20% upfront, and the remaining balance is paid in installments. This system is quite popular and offers a manageable way to make large purchases without straining your budget.
payment.cashText: You can fully pay the total amount in cash, which is priced at $600.72.
